root.name: James Bond 007
root.description: OverviewThe player takes control of Bond's famous Aston Martin car in a side-scrolling adventure through four stages based off of Bond films.StagesDiamonds Are Forever stage beginningThe four movie based stages are:Diamonds are ForeverMoonrakerFor Your Eyes OnlyThe Spy Who Loved meEach stage has a unique goal that needs to be accomplished, and a variety of enemies trying to stop you from completing your task.GameplayPlayers travel through the stages, firing lasers or bullets to wipe out enemies. Bond's car is capable of travelling through land, air, and sea, depending on the stage. Obstacles must be avoided, and you will need to evade enemy fire.
